dataRoles.name: category
dataRoles.description: The category to split the bars across. (Optional - use for doing mutliple KPIs)

dataRoles.name: value
dataRoles.description: The value that represents how filled the bar is. Dependent on whether this exceeds the target, the color of the filled area will be different. The colors for this visual can becontrolled in the formattting under Colors - Indicators.

dataRoles.name: target
dataRoles.description: The target that you're trying to view if the value passes. This is then used with a ratio against the max to draw where the line should be on the bar.

dataRoles.name: max
dataRoles.description: This is the number that the visual will use to mark as the ending of the bar. It has to be greater than the target for it to be valid.

defaultColorNoTargetFill.displayName: Default Color for No Target fill

defaultColorNoTargetText.displayName: Default Color for No Target text
